description: üèóÔ∏è TrashQuest connects communities to clean up public spaces and protect nature. It is a work in progress, please find the project description in our github repository and contact heleneruelle@hotmail.com if you want to join !

login.title: Please login to your account
login.error: Oops! There seems to be a problem with your credentials. We're working on resolving it. Please try again soon.

create-new-account.description: Your mission to clean up the world starts here!

hint.username: Your username will be your profile name and visible in events and quests.
hint.location: Your location helps us recommend quests nearby.

create-new-quest.title: Create a new quest

input.name: Quest name
input.start: Choose quest start date and time
input.end: Choose quest end date and time

hint.name: Try to provide a short but very descriptive title to help other users undertsand your quest.
hint.location: Add a location or address. Be as specific as possible, it will make it easier for your guests to find you.
hint.description: Provide a short description to give more context on your quest. max 3000 char.
hint.equipment: Choose as many options as necessary. This will indicate to your guests if they should bring equipment of their own. Otherwise they will assume you will provide everything for the quest.
hint.environment: Choose as many options as necessary. This will indicate to your guests what kind of place they should expect to find themselves in.
hint.accessibility: Choose as many options as necessary. This will indicate to your guests if the quest location is accessible for them.

create-new-quest.error: Oops! There seems to be a problem with the creation of a new quest. We're in the process of resolving it. Please try again soon.

error.title: Sorry there seem to be a problem, the quest you are looking for no longer exists.
error.join: Sorry, it seems your request to join this quest has failed.

quest.joined: Congratulations! You're registered for this quest ‚öî !
